name: Gingerbread Man Run
description:
Help the Gingerbread Man make his way through a candy-filled wonderland!

Gingerbread Man Run is a FREE, simple and addicting game that's fun for all ages. Help the Gingerbread Man (or Gingerbread Girl!) jump from platform to platform as he collects candy to keep him going!

How long can you run through this magical candy land? How much candy can you collect? Be sure to jump over those lollipops and candy canes that are in your way!

Collect enough candy and you can unlock the awesome "Ninjabread Man" or "Skaterbread Man" for even more fun!


*** FEATURES ***

* Incredible endless gameplay means a new game every time
* Collect candy to unlock more characters
* Simple game controls good for both kids and adults
* Amazing graphics
* Game Center enabled
* Universal app supports iPhone / iPad / iPod Touch


Download Gingerbread Man Run right now while it's 100% FREE!
